sentences.en: God isn't finished with you, either, so keep moving forward. Even the snail reached the ark by persevering!
sentences.cn: 同样上帝也还没完成你的创造，所以继续向前努力吧，不屈不挠的蜗牛也到达了诺亚方舟呢！

sentences.en: Refine fine goods for people is the company's persevering pursue.
sentences.cn: 精制良品为万民是公司孜孜不倦的追求.

sentences.en: Refusing to give up or let go; persevering obstinately.
sentences.cn: 坚持不懈的,执意的拒绝放弃或听任的; 顽固坚持的.

sentences.en: Success belongs to people who are persevering.
sentences.cn: 成功属于坚持不懈的人.
胜利属于不屈不挠的人.

sentences.en: Such power of persevering devoted labour as Mr Casaubon's is not common.
sentences.cn: 卡苏朋先生那种孜孜不倦,坚韧不拔的工作态度并不多见.

sentences.en: The Major's persevering benevolence was not to be balked in this way.
sentences.cn: 少校的仁慈是坚决的,它不会因此就偃旗息鼓.

sentences.en: They will only triumph by persevering in their against natural calamities.
sentences.cn: 他们只有坚持向自然灾害作斗争,才能取得胜利.

sentences.en: They will only triumph by persevering in their struggle against natural calamities.
sentences.cn: 他们只有坚持与自然灾害搏斗,才能取得胜利.

sentences.en: This paper given discribes a convex persevering fitting method.
sentences.cn: 文中描述了一种保凸参数拟合方法.

sentences.en: To learn is rather a painstaking and persevering business.
sentences.cn: 最重要的因素,这个人自己努力.

sentences.en: Two persevering climbers finally reached the top of the mountain.
sentences.cn: 两名锲而不舍的攀登者终于到达了山顶.

sentences.en: Victory belongs to the most persevering.
sentences.cn: 胜利属于最有毅力的人.

sentences.en: With persevering ( or patient ) industry she revived the failing business.
sentences.cn: 她用 不屈不挠 的奋斗振兴了那家衰败的企业.

words.tran_cn: 坚持；不屈不挠；固执己见（在辩论中）

trans.tran_cn: 坚忍，坚持( persevere的现在分词 )
